description: Provide one-on-one C++ tutoring to other college students, creating custom quizzes and practice problems tailored to individual learning needs.
Instructed 36 first-generation EOP students in Python programming; all students improved scores between midterm and final through twice-weekly recitations and 16 hours of weekly tutoring.
Led planning of technical workshops and networking events, increasing average attendance by 34% and expanding membership by 112 students.
Founding developer for SHPE NJIT mobile app, delivering production-quality code in a professional development environment. Deploying to over 300 active students soon.
Analyzed social media engagement metrics with Python, developing data-driven strategies that generated 300M+ Instagram views in 6 months and 20M+ views on sponsored content.
